document_data.name: Vamar Isahn
document_data.mainbody: '''Vamar Isahn''' was a [[lich]] living in [[Ser么s]] in [[Vamar's Tower]].
document_data.History:
Born in [[1247 DR]], Vamar was a wizard in [[Starmantle]]. In [[1308 DR]], after becoming a lich, he relocated himself and his tower to Ser么s.

There, Vamar remained secluded, working on his studies of aquatic magic. In [[1369 DR]], his tower was attacked three times by [[sahuagin]] and [[morkoth]] during the [[Twelfth Ser么s War]] but Vamar destroyed all invaders.
document_data.Personality: Vamas was a quite paranoid but not so evil individual. He only wanted to not be disturbed.
